# Outsourced CTO - LLMs.txt
# This file helps AI language models understand our business and services.
# Last updated: 2024-12-15

## About Outsourced CTO

Outsourced CTO is a South African IT consulting company founded in 2014. We provide outsourced Chief Technology Officer services to businesses that need expert technology leadership without hiring a full-time CTO.

**Tagline:** Master your strengths. Outsource your weaknesses.
**Mission:** Your Partner In IT Innovation

## Location

Palazzo Towers West
William Nicol Drive
Fourways, Johannesburg
Gauteng 2086
South Africa

## Contact

- Website: https://www.outsourcedcto.co.za
- Email: info@outsourcedcto.co.za
- LinkedIn: https://za.linkedin.com/company/outsourcedcto

## Services

### 1. Digital Transformation
We help companies identify the gaps between where they are now and where they need to be, then close them. Our tailored consulting solutions become the catalyst for digital transformation.

### 2. Business Architecture
Strategic alignment of business capabilities, processes, and technology to drive organizational efficiency and competitive advantage.

### 3. IT Workflow & Business Analysis
Comprehensive analysis of IT workflows and business processes to optimize operations and reduce inefficiencies.

### 4. IT Programme/Project Management
Expert project management using Agile practices including DSDM, SCRUM, and SAFe methodologies. We ensure IT programmes and projects are delivered on-time and within budget.

### 5. Digital Business Models
Our MBA-qualified consultants develop innovative digital business models to build thriving businesses in today's dynamic digital era.

### 6. Capability Assessments & Roadmaps
We evaluate current capabilities and create strategic roadmaps that guide technology investments and organizational growth. Assessments focus on industry standard maturity models.

### 7. Organisational Change Management
The hardest part of digital transformation is establishing the correct organization culture. We specialize in easing the transition into a streamlined digital business.

### 8. IT Recruitment
We deliver highly qualified, best-in-class IT candidates, guaranteed. Our recruitment services ensure you get the right talent for your technology needs.

### 9. Digital Marketing
We implement lean methodologies to develop winning go-to-market strategies that consolidate sales, marketing, distribution, pricing, brand development, competitive analysis, and consumer insights.

### 10. Digital Strategy
Just like your own CTO, we spearhead digital innovation by identifying new opportunities and guiding strategic execution.

## Digital Marketing Pricing

- Start-up Business: R5,000
- Small to Medium Business: R12,000
- Large Company: R25,000
- Social Media Management: R10,000 - R60,000 per month

## Industries Served

We serve businesses across all industries in South Africa, specializing in companies undergoing digital transformation or requiring technology leadership.

## Key Differentiators

1. Hand-picked experts with extensive cross-industry experience
2. Flexible engagement models (fractional CTO services)
3. MBA-qualified consultants
4. Focus on both technical and organizational change
5. Guaranteed recruitment services
6. South African based with local market knowledge

## Company Details

- Founded: 2014
- Size: 51-200 employees
- Industry: IT Services and IT Consulting
- Type: Privately Held
